forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: light and part settings -> lock features file

comments.text: i suggest the light and part limit settings be added to the lock features file, it would allow for personalized settings persisting across sessions.
